main event: Witness observed a bright light moving in a straight line at a constant speed above the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 3 to 5 minutes,The light appeared very bright and silver in color, larger than a star,The object was oval-shaped and exhibited maneuvers,The sighting was brief, lasting about 12 seconds,The object moved at very high speed over the sea.
sighted object: a bright silver light and an oval-shaped luminous object
location: Gulf of Bothnia, Baltic Sea, Sweden
witness description: The observer noted the object was flat, brilliantly lighted, and moved at high speed, leaving no trace.
